address2: Gelistirme Bölgesi, Davutpasa Kampüsü Çifte Havuzlar Mah Eski Lon Eski Londra Asfalti Cad, YTÜ-Davutpasa Kampüsü
longBusinessSummary: Kafein Yazilim Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S. provides various software solutions and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers Data Touch, a tool that enables customer to sense its data with various analysis options and leads data-driven decisions; Test Data Management software; DataSkope, a database activity monitoring and prevention product; Infraskope, a log management and SIEM solution; Foramind, a software that develops and organizes information and idea by visualizing them; and Parkinson's care, a mobile platform for remote monitoring of the treatment processes of Parkinson; vast data universal storage; and corporate portal. It also provides turnkey projects, cyber security, data virtualization consulting, robotic process automation, KVKK project consultancy, outsourcing, data decision management systems consultancy, test management and digital transformation consultancy, data warehouse and managed consulting, software development, advanced analytics, and IT operation management solutions and services. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
